words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H7200 Qal imv. 2ms of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'see', ESV 'see', NASB 'see'
H5414 Qal perf. 1cs + 2ms suff. of נָתַן 'to give, set'; KJV 'I have made thee', ESV 'I have made you', NASB 'I make you'
H430 n.mp אֱלֹהִים 'God, gods'; KJV 'a god', ESV 'like God', NASB 'as God'
H6547 prep. l- + proper name; KJV 'to Pharaoh', ESV 'to Pharaoh', NASB 'to Pharaoh'
H175 conj. + proper name; all trans. agree
H251 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. אָח 'brother'; KJV 'thy brother', ESV 'your brother', NASB 'your brother'
H1961 Qal impf. 3ms of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'shall be', ESV 'shall be', NASB 'shall be'
H5030 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. נָבִיא 'prophet'; KJV 'thy prophet', ESV 'your prophet', NASB 'your prophet'
